properties.markdownProperty:
Built-in repositories may have a translation and an icon. The icon is added using the `iconx.xml` config file, translations are added using the prefix `settings.repository.{folder_name}` in the translations files ( `{folder_name}` refers the archetype repository folder name).
They are presented as 'default' application repositories. Once repository maybe selected in the application configuration dialog. Optionally, the user can uncheck the default repository checkbox in order to select a custom repository.
